titles.title: Condemning Mayor Muriel Bowser, Council Chair Phil Mendelson, Councilman Charles Allen, and the rest of the government of the city of Washington, DC, for their failure to stop the crime epidemic plaguing their city.

Condemning Mayor Muriel Bowser, Council Chair Phil Mendelson, Councilman Charles Allen, and the rest of the government of the city of Washington, DC, for their failure to stop the crime epidemic plaguing their city.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns District of Columbia (DC) Mayor Muriel Bowser, Council Chairman Phil Mendelson, Councilmember Charles Allen, and the rest of the DC government for crime in DC.
